name: Yvette
descriptions: Yvette is a co-leader of the Scorpions gang living in the Monte Carlo Suites in 2281.

Along with Roller, Yvette leads the small-time raider gang known as the Scorpions, who are involved in slinging chems within and out of the New Vegas area. Like other raider gangs, the Scorpions will attack strangers on sight.

Ammunition for the Scorpions: At some point in development Yvette would have been the source of an optional, unmarked quest to aid the Scorpions gang in obtaining "a steady supply of ammunition from the NCR quartermaster at Camp McCarran." This quest was never fully implemented, but some resources related to it remain, in particular, a note titled "Ammunition for the Scorpions."
